mapper.sql: PAY_ORDER_WX_ID as payOrderWxId, PAY_INFO_ID as payInfoId, APPID as appid, MCH_ID as mchId, DEVICE_INFO as deviceInfo, BODY as body, DETAIL as detail, ATTACH as attach, FEE_TYPE as feeType, TOTAL_FEE as totalFee, SPBILL_CREATE_IP as spbillCreateIp, TIME_START as timeStart, TIME_EXPIRE as timeExpire, GOODS_TAG as goodsTag, TRADE_TYPE as tradeType, PRODUCT_ID as productId, LIMIT_PAY as limitPay, OPENID as openid, PREPAY_ID as prepayId, CODE_URL as codeUrl, PREPAY_RESULT_CODE as prepayResultCode, PAY_TRANSACTION_ID as payTransactionId, PAY_RESULT_CODE as payResultCode, BANK_TYPE as bankType, SETTLEMENT_TOTAL_FEE as settlementTotalFee, CASH_FEE as cashFee, CASH_FEE_TYPE as cashFeeType, COUPON_FEE as couponFee, COUPON_COUNT as couponCount, COUPON_DETAIL_LIST as couponDetailList, TIME_END as timeEnd, IS_VALID as isValid
mapper.select:
select
distinct
from pay_order_wx
order by ${orderByClause}
